structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.catch_line: Cooperative library services with other states.
law.text: The Department for Libraries and Archives is empowered to enter into an agreement with any state for the purpose of providing cooperative library services.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VIII, B, sec. 1. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 3.
